document.full_text: apple computer users were targeted by fake antivirus software that hopes to gain access to users' credit cards. apple said wednesday that it plans to issue a software update to remove the malware.
document.title: apple operating system affected by malware
lines_and_colors: apple computer users were targeted by fake antivirus software that hopes to gain access to users' credit cards. apple said wednesday that it plans to issue a software update to remove the malware.
